DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare early vessel heal implantation SYNERGY drug elute stent ( DES ) BioMatrix NeoFlex DES one three month two cohort .
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , open label , single blind , randomize study inclusion 160 patient two equal size cohort ( A B ) . Angiographic follow-up optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) perform 1 month ( Cohort A ) 3 month ( Cohort B ) . Randomization 1:1 SYNERGY BioMatrix Neoflex . The Cohorts include consecutively , Cohort A first .
DOC.criteria: Patients > 18 year treat one drugeluting stent coronary artery Aarhus University Hospital Odense University Hospital Age < 18 year Do wish participate Unable provide write informed consent Domicile outside Denmark Do speak Danish Inclusion SORTOUT VIII study Inclusion stent study Expected survival < 1 year Allergy aspirin , clopidogrel , prasugrel ticagrelor Hypersensitivity everolimus biolimus The operator wish use DES Reduced renal function ; creatinine > 120 mmol / L Only bare metal stent ( BMS ) implantation Only plain old balloon angioplasty ( POBA )
